MsgConnectFullAccessAlert: By connecting your as full access mode the game will not send you the transactions, this in order to offer a better game experience.
MsgConnectAlert: By connecting your safe way confirmation in certain parts of the game will be required.
MsgAccountAlert: Do you want to disconnect your Burrito Battle?
MsgBattleAlert: There is a battle going on and you won't be able to do anything else until the battle is over, you can also surrender but this will cost you 1 life.
TleBuyStrwAlert: Do you want to buy tokens?
MsgBuyStrwAlert: The straw tokens serve you to undermine new burritos, increase them level, restore their lives, among other things, unfortunately you can only buy tokens straw once per time.
MsgMintBurritoAlert: The undermine a burrito allows you to fight other burritos and explore the map. The cost of burrito is 5 Nears and $ 50,000 Strw. Currently you have
MsgNoBuyStrwAlert:
Buying straw tokens takes a epoch, 
so you still have to wait to buy tokens.
DontHaveEnoughSTRWForMint: You dont have enough $STRAW Tokens for buy a burrito, you need 50000 $STRW.
DontHaveEnoughNearForMint: You dont have enough $Nears for buy a burrito, you need 5 $Near.
DontHaveEnoughNearForBuyStraw: You dont have enough $Nears for buy Straw tokens, you need 1 $Near.
MsgSelectedBurritoAlert: To be able to fight other burritos you need to select one of your burritos. Go to the stable to select some burrito or the silo to undermine a new burrito.
MsgWildBurritoAlert: A wild burrito has appeared, do you want to face him? The level and statistics of the burrito are unknown, once entering into combat if you run away, your burrito lost 1 life.
TleGoBarnAlert: Do you want to enter the stable?
MsgGoBarnAlert: Here you can see your burritos, select some burrito, cure them and level them level.
TleGoSiloAlert: Do you want to enter the silo?
MsgGoSiloAlert: Here you can undermine new burritos and buy $ strw
TleGoColiseumAlert: Do you want to enter the colosseum?
MsgGoColiseumAlert: Here you can participate in incursions.
MsgBurritoInIncursion: Currently one of your burritos is registered to participate in the current incursion. Do you want to go to the coliseum?
TleDeadBurritoAlert: Your burrito has run out of lives
MsgDeadBurritoAlert: The selected Burrito does not have enough life, to continue select a different Burrito to be able to continue browsing the map or fighting.
MsgColiseumFullAccess: To participate in the incursion you need to enter "Full access" mode otherwise you will have a great disadvantage.
MsgLevelUp: To level up a burrito you must have at least 10 wins in combat.
MsgNotLives: This burrito cannot be selected because it has no lives
MsgRestoreLivesAlert: Restoring the Burrito's lives will allow you to use this Burrito again to explore the meadow and fight in battles. The cost is 1 Near and 30,000 $STRW. You currently have
TleEvolveAlert: Do you want to evolve this Burrito?
MsgEvolveAlert: By evolving this Burrito, it will raise its level and increase its statistics. The cost is 2 Near and 70,000 $STRW. You currently have
MsgColiseumDestroyAlert: The colosseum suffered a lot of damage to the latest vent so it is in reconstruction for the next vent.
